name: Planet Escape (Adrián Bayardi)
description:
Planet Escape is a project created for a videogame development career.

It is a procedural Third Person Shooter game, where you must survive on a strange planet.

Controls:

Move: ASDW

Shoot: Right Click

Jump: Spacebar

Music from: https://mixkit.co/

Programmer: Adrián Bayardi

3D Artist: Nicolás Oliver (https://www.artstation.com/ole2)

Animations and 2D Artist: Maitena Rodriguez
